page.title: 10Mr.Mount the Milkman
page.content: Mr.Paul Mount was born in Sheffield and is 38 years old. He came to Tideswell in 1970.He had a job with Sheffield Corporation as a gardener. Mr.Mount is self-employed.He sells ordinary milk,skimmed milk, cream, yoghurts,potatoes and fruit drinks. Milk costs 23 pence a bottle but in 1973 it only cost 5p. The milk float carries 24 crates of milk stacked 2 crates high.A crate of milk carries about 20 pints making a total of about 500 pints on a load.Milk is delivered seven days a week. Mr.Mount gets up to start the milk round at 6 o'clock.Mr. Mount recently had a pedometer given to him which indicates that he walks about 8 1/2 miles a day.Mr. Mount once spilt a van load of milk and had to clean it up.
